Contributor: Benda, Wladyslaw T. (Wladyslaw Theodore), 1873-, artist.; American National Red Cross, publisher.; Alco-Gravure, lithographer.;
Note: Signed "W.T. Benda." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that you can help by your contributions to the American Red Cross. Illustration shows a women knitting. A Red Cross is seen on the top left of the poster.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : American Red Cross,
